# Created by ___FULLUSERNAME___ on ___DATE___ for project <#ProjectName#>.

# This configuration file includes only the settings we wish to set or change.
# For more information about these settings, or about the many additional settings available,
#	see Support/BuildSupport/Doxygen/Default.doxygen or the Doxygen application.

PROJECT_NAME			= <#ProjectName#>
OUTPUT_DIRECTORY		= $(HOME)/Library/CCDev/Sites/Doxygen/<#ProjectName#>
STRIP_FROM_PATH			= $(HOME)/Dev/<#ProjectName#>
EXTRACT_ALL				= YES
INPUT					= $(HOME)/Dev/<#ProjectName#>/<#SourcePath#>
EXCLUDE_PATTERNS		= *.plist *.pch
EXCLUDE					= en.lproj
RECURSIVE				= YES
EXAMPLE_PATTERNS		= *
GENERATE_DOCSET			= YES
DOCSET_FEEDNAME			= <#ProjectName#>
DOCSET_BUNDLE_ID		= com.candcsoft.<#ProjectName#>
DOCSET_PUBLISHER_ID		= com.candcsoft.Publisher
GENERATE_LATEX			= NO
IMAGE_PATH				= $(HOME)/Dev/<#ProjectName#>/Docs/Images
